inclusion.criterion: Post-partum (singleton pregnancy) African-American women who are exclusively breastfeeding
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Post-partum (singleton pregnancy) African-American women are non-lactating
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Controls- Healthy non-pregnant African-American women will be race and age-matched to the breast-feeding women in group one
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subjects with cardiac, hypertensive, vascular, renal (serum creatinine of >1.5), pulmonary, endocrine, musculoskeletal, hepatic, hematologic or malignant or rheumatologic disease
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Smokers and those with a history of significant alcohol or drug abuse are excluded
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Baseline hypertension (systolic BP > 160 mm/Hg) or hypotension (systolic BP < 90 mm/Hg)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Subjects taking any chronic medications except stable doses of thyroid hormone, prenatal, vitamin supplements, or oral contraceptives
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Those who have received any investigational drug in past 90 days will be excluded from the study
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Women who are currently pregnant will be excluded from the study. Women who became pregnant by In Vitro Fertilization IVF or any hormonal manipulation (i.e. fertility drugs such as clomid ) are also excluded, as they may have an altered pre-pregnant hormonal state.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Subjects are not allowed to donate blood between study visits
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has Paget's Disease of Bone and is starting Bisphosphonate therapy. The patient's family history is significant for hypertension in the mother and DM type 2 in the father.
